name: Gaming
description: Are you the kind of gamer who makes fast decisions on their feet? Or are you the calculating kind who peers into the future before each move? Either way, we've got your backs covered at Pravega: Recreation with a truck load of rewards- filled-fun in the form of two events:

• Bishops Before Knights: an exciting chess tournament. click here to register
  • Battlegrounds Mobile India: a thrilling BGMI competition. click here to register

modules.heading: Bishops Before Knights
modules.content:
The rules given below, and any that will be communicated later on, are to be followed strictly, violation of which shall lead to a penalty, that may result in disqualification.

No registration fees
Eligibility: Open to all
Date: 26th to 31st July, 2021

modules.heading: Battlegrounds Mobile India
modules.content:
No registration fees
Eligiblity: Open to all
Prelims: 26th and 27th July
Finals: 31st July
Last date to register: 22nd July, 2021

The rules mentioned here, and any that will be communicated later on, are to be followed strictly, violation of which shall lead to a penalty, that may result in disqualification.

modules.heading: Prizes
modules.content:
Bishops Before Knights: Cash prize upto 25k INR
Battlegrounds Mobile India: Cash prize upto 20k INR
